title: CN Level 7 â€” Network Security Basics
intro: This level introduces basic concepts of security in computer networks.
points: Understand goals of security: confidentiality, integrity, availability.
Know what encryption roughly does (scramble data using a key).
Concept of firewalls and basic packet filtering.
Basic idea of authentication vs authorization.
Recognize common threats: eavesdropping, spoofing, DoS (concept only).
